title: STRAW HATS VS FRANKY FAMILY! | One Piece Episode 233 & 234 Reaction
author: Unknown Reactor
description: A reaction video covering One Piece episodes 233 and 234, focusing on the Straw Hats' confrontation with the Franky Family after Usopp is beaten and the money is stolen.

title: STRAW HATS ROBBED BY FRANKY FAMILY?! | One Piece Episode 233 Couples Reaction & Discussion
author: Unknown Reactor Couple
description: A couples reaction and discussion video for One Piece Episode 233, focusing on the shocking moment when the Straw Hats are robbed by the Franky Family and Usopp is beaten.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Episode-specific reaction with no future spoilers

title: Episode 233 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for One Piece Episode 233, including plot summary, character appearances, trivia, and manga chapter references.

title: One Piece: How Franky Changed From Villain to Nakama
author: CBR Staff
description: An article analyzing Franky's character arc from his introduction as an antagonist who beats up Usopp and steals the crew's money in Episode 233, to eventually becoming a beloved member of the Straw Hat Pirates.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Franky joining the Straw Hats

title: Water 7, Baron Omatsuri, and the Core of One Piece
author: The Turkish Rug
description: A thematic essay exploring the Water 7 arc's emotional core, discussing how the arc deals with themes of loss, grief, and the bonds of friendship through events like the Going Merry's fate and Usopp's conflict with Luffy.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains thematic spoilers for the Water 7 arc

title: One Piece Episode 233 - Just Sanji being emotional and Zoro being wise and Chopper being their son
author: @torao-d-water-ya
description: A Tumblr post highlighting a specific scene from Episode 233 where Sanji shows emotion, Zoro displays wisdom about being pirates, and Chopper observes, creating a family-like dynamic.
